isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - ENGINE COVER TRIM PANEL and cup holder

svcproc.title: ENGINE COVER TRIM PANEL and cup holder

svcsubproc.title: Install Engine Cover Trim Panel and Cup Holder on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 95
for Items in parentheses.

note.para: There are two plastic tabs positioned on the back of the right side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9). The lower plastic tab slides into lower console brace (Item 10). The upper plastic tab slides into support bracket (Item 11). The lower console brace and support bracket are attached to the AC cover trim panel (Item 12).

step1.para: Slide engine cover trim panel (Item 9) under center dash control panel and over engine cover.
Install two pan head torx screw (Item 8) through upper right side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9) and tighten.
Install one pan head torx screw (Item 8) through front right side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9) and tighten.
Install one pan head torx screw (Item 8) through top left side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9) and tighten.
